name: matic
description: Introduing Matic Network === **[Matic](https://matic.network/)** is a decentralized platform using [Plasma framework](https://academy.binance.com/blockchain/what-is-ethereum-plasma) that provides faster and low-cost transactions. Matic is trying to improve some current blockchain challenges. * Confirmation Speed * Gas fees * User interaction with blockchain * Easier development * ...
